name: Stay Off Please
description:
Get the green. Avoid the white. 

Stay Off Please or SOP was inspired by my experience hearing people who are afraid of getting infected by Corona virus, but still need to go to buy food, risking his/her life. 

From that, I try to make this game playable to everyone and encourage them that we can fight this virus by doing physical distance. Stay healthy! and Stay Off Please.

Do you enjoy this game? if so, we welcome for your supports!

You can pay what you want for this game and you can share this game to your friends.

If you have any feedbacks, suggestions, or found any bugs, you can simply email me at sawirgame@gmail.com

If you decide to pay the game, please do send email of the proof of your pay and I will reply back to you with a thank you email!

Made by Sawir Studio (Ricardo Sawir)
